name: Oxlade
description: '''Ikuforiji Olaitan Abdulrahman'''{{Audio|Ikuforiji_Olaitan_Abdulrahman.wav|listen}} (born 22 April 1997), known professionally as '''Oxlade''', is a Nigerian singer and songwriter signed to Troniq Music, [[Epic Records]] in France, and [[Columbia Records]] in the UK. He rose to prominence with the release of the song "[[Away (Oxlade song)|Away]]", which appeared on ''[[Rolling Stone]]''{{'}}s 50 best songs of 2020. After the success of his 2022 single "[[Ku Lo Sa]]", Oxlade was named [[Pandora (service)|Pandora]] Africa's Next Artist in July 2022.
